official_title: A bill to provide for an adjustment in the area authorized for acquisition at the Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana.

summary.text: Revises the area authorized for acquisition for the establishment of the Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge in Louisiana to include any additional lands and waters adjacent to the boundaries on the February 1980 map of such refuge which the Secretary of the Interior considers appropriate for inclusion.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an adjustment in the area authorized for acquisition at the Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana.
